column5: Well, what a difference having good fishing budy with a snowmobile makes Thanks for Cityfisher we've had one of those great days out there that more than make for my walking nightmares from week ago. Started early...wasted the first 3 hours with nothing to show for, not even a sniff....not giving up that easily moved to plan B...and it was "the plan" as we got them big time...both got limit quickly and decided to put up a small clinic for a 7 year old Russian boy and his father fishing close by...got to love the smiles and fire into the kids eyes every time I called him over to reel in the next moster from the deep He got quite good at it at the end... 75 fow today was the right dept Meegs was the killer lure today, almost all fish were caught on it.... Must have got 7-8 whities and probably missed that many more....fun all the way for sure...  Here is Citifisher's first one:    While he was all toasty inside the hut and paying his duties to the fishing Gods (left few lures under the ice;-)  I was having fantastic time not far from him....getting the russin boy to run (and fall in the snow) and run again to come reel in yet another fish was priceless.  Here is him at the end:    His father was very happy...and I wish my boys were there,...oh well...did I say I am going to buy a new snow machine to make sure they do come for the whities show with me....yep....soon...  Maybe this season that started not so well will finally get into more familiar tracks  Anyhow...time to fillet them and there will be smoker time tomorrow Thanks again for the ride Citifisher, enjoined the day and we've got to do it again...and get ready for those summer kings on Lake O.....but make sure you change your line....your current one will not do it ha ha ha   Cheers, Ice Fisherman
Awesome job!! Snow machines and quads definitely make you catch more fish!! heehee
Awesome report and pics icefisherman Good on you for giving that boy a chance to reel in a few fishes Thanks for sharing Leechman

Awesome Emil.. Thanks for stopping by to share your stories.. sure wish you'd have left me one of them fish.. hahah But I should be soon out there with ya all catchin my own...  Loved the stories of your day... Thanks for sharing..
Great report Emil.  That's fantastic that you made that little boy's day  Well done  Joey
Excellent.  My sled changed my whole icefishing experience.  The kid must of had a blast.
That's good to get another youngster "hooked" on fishing.
Learned today:   Great Day Emil! It was a Pleasure to spend the day chasing whities with you.
Some good size fish on the ice! Nice report Emil, you deserved a good day out there after last weekend! How long before its safe enough to drive out?

nice catch glad you found em today .. i  came home smelling like the good old black and white striped road rat.... moved all over the map  from innisville to long shole.. they seemed to have moved from last week  ... always tomorow  .. great to see  some one making a youngsters day . hatts off to that , way to go man . Something this young man will remember for the rest of his life  ... cheers and tight lines...
nice fish and pics! Thanks for sharing

Well Brian,  not sure we we ever get enough ice for driving....just too much snow on the ice and too much slush despite the super cold temps recently...so we'll have to wait and see but doesn't look to good right now for a car/truck drive any time soon .  Cheers, Ice Fisherman

+1 After we trekked around in the sled all sunday and going through enough slushholes that almost slowed us down to a stop. It might be a tough year for ice driving. ** Doesn't effect me though since Ive retired for driving vehicles on the ice
Good job on the ice. Guys hoping here to hit the hut early in the a.m before the big storm moves through.
Good shooting guys!   Tough weekend for me... Glad someone layed a beating on them!
Look at the size O Them Whities .
Well, hurry up and buy a sled!
